channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street nameplate missing., 8th August
item.description:
The name plate was attached to a frame set into the grass verge about a metre from the North Eastern corner of Hemming Way and to the Western side of number 29 Bishops Drive. The uprights and wooden cross piece ( rotten ) remain but the name plate has disappeared; it has been missing for about a month.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hemming Way, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 18 Yarnolds, 8th August
item.description:
Large pot hole in road close to pavement. Due to cars parking on opposite side of road you cannot avoid pothole

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20;22;24;26, Yarnolds, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path gated with signs discouraging use “private” and “caution dogs roam free”, 8th August
item.description:
Gate next to sign saying public footpath
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 8th August
item.description:
28 day with lane closure plus temporary footway closure needed please cut back overgrown hedge an vegetation growing out into footway back to boundary appropriately 70000x3000mm (Overgrown Hedge)
